isis.stitle: CAB: 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 AND 8600 MODELS - INSTALL - REAR INTERIOR TRIM PANEL

svcsubproc.title: Install Rear Interior Trim Panel on Standard Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 and 8600 Models, Extended Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 8500 and 8600 Models and Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models

note.para: The step below shows installing both driver and passenger side corner and side interior trim panels after installing rear interior trim panel. If one or the other of the corner and side interior trim panels was not removed during the removal step, you will need only to reinstall the side and corner interior trim panel that was removed.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 107 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Place rear interior trim panel (Item 3) inside the cab.

Position rear interior trim panel (Item 3) over mounting holes in cab back panel and install five push-in fasteners (Item 2) across the top of the rear interior trim panel. Make sure floor mat is properly fitted around rear interior trim panel at the bottom.

Install passenger and driver side corner and side interior corner trim panel, refer to
CORNER AND SIDE INTERIOR TRIM PANEL
. For installing passenger and driver side corner and side interior trim panel into standard cab, refer to Install Corner and Side Interior Trim Panel on Standard Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 and 8600 Models. For installing passenger and driver side corner and side interior trim panel into extended cab, refer to Install Corner and Side Interior Trim Panel on Extended Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 8500 and 8600 Models. For installing passenger and driver side corner and side interior trim panel into crew cab, refer to Install Corner and Side Interior Trim Panel on Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models.
